list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a weight in boxing and other sports intermediate between featherweight and welterweight. In the amateur boxing scale it ranges from 125 to 132 pounds (57 to 60 kg).
a person or thing that is lightly built or constructed.
of thin material or build and weighing less than average.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một bộ đồ màu xám nhẹ

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the newspaper is lightweight and trivial
